title: Morse interview covers commodities landscape.
summary: In an appearance on Bloomberg TV, Ed Morse, Citi's Global Head of Commodities Research, discussed a range of issues affecting energy, metals and agricultural markets, including the possibility of the International Energy Agency making another release of oil from emergency stockpiles, the impact of ongoing disruption of Libya's oil supply, fixed-asset investment in emerging markets and weather events.
tag-2: In an appearance on Bloomberg TV, Ed Morse, Citi's Global Head of Commodities Research, discussed a range of issues affecting energy, metals and agricultural markets, including the possibility of the International Energy Agency making another release of oil from emergency stockpiles, the impact of ongoing disruption of Libya's oil supply, fixed-asset investment in emerging markets and weather events.
